1.translation_en: With the name of Allah, the All-Merciful, the Very-Merciful.

2.translation_en: Praise belongs to Allah, the Lord of all the worlds.

4.translation_en: the Master of the Day of Requital.

5.translation_en: You alone do we worship, and from You alone do we seek help.

6.translation_en: Take us on the straight path.

7.text_uthmani: صِرَاطَ الَّذِیْنَ اَنْعَمْتَ عَلَیْهِمْ ۙ۬ۦ غَیْرِ الْمَغْضُوْبِ عَلَیْهِمْ وَلَا الضَّآلِّیْنَ ۟۠
7.transliteration: Sirata allatheena anAAamta AAalayhim ghayri almaghdoobi AAalayhim wala addalleen
7.translation_en: the path of those on whom You have bestowed Your Grace, not of those who have incurred Your wrath, nor of those who have gone astray.
